tags.name: zui-notifier
tags.description:
### Example
```html
<zui-notifier id="notifier" type="success" header="Nice job!" description="Your one off email has been sent.">
```

attributes.name: header
attributes.description: The static header of the notifier. If you don't have dynamic text, otherwise use zui-notifier-controller.

attributes.name: parent-selector
attributes.description:
The static parentselector to determine the parent of the notifier. If you don't have dynamic text, otherwise use zui-notifier-controller.
If this parameter is not set then the default is the display the notifer in the top right of the document body.
Syntax would be standard query selector language (i.e #parentDiv would search for a div id of "parentDiv" and display the notifer
in the top right corner of that div tag).

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
The static type of notifier. If you don't have dynamic text, otherwise use zui-notifier-controller.
The types of notifier include: 'info', success', 'warning', 'error'

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: The amount of time, in milliseconds, this notifier should persist
